Texts.Chs: 当你的肚子饿了，你有几种选择。其中一种是用^orange;篝火^reset;烹饪你获得的肉类，所需的时间很少，但是你需要^green;弓^reset;，^orange;猎矛^reset;，^orange;骨矛^reset;或者^orange;狩猎步枪^reset;来获得肉类。得到一些肉再烹饪它。真是美味。
Texts.Eng: When you're starving, you have some options. A ^orange;Campfire^reset; cooks your meat. It's fast, but you'll need a ^green;bow^reset;, ^orange;Hunting Spear^reset;, ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; or ^orange;Hunting Rifle^reset; to obtain the meat. Get some and cook it. Then noms.

Texts.Chs: 你也可以用一点挖矿的时间制作一个^orange;锄头^reset;，然后种地获利！这块地能养活你；如果你通过放置^green;殖民契约^reset;建立了^orange;殖民地^reset;，那么这块地也能养活大家，带领大家走向致富之路。
Texts.Eng: You can craft a ^orange;Hoe^reset;, but take mine instead. Try making a viable farm! It will feed you and could even lead to a thriving community if you built a ^orange;Colony^reset; by placing a ^green;Colony Deed^reset;.
